languages.text: "Смирение не входит в список моих добродетелей, ксенос. Пусть за тебя и вступил{mf|ся|ась} Вольный Торговец... Один неверный взгляд. Одно неловкое слово. Один подозрительный жест — и твоя жизнь оборвется".
"Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."
languages.original_text: "Смирение не входит в список моих добродетелей, ксенос. Пусть за тебя и вступил{mf|ся|ась} Вольный Торговец... Один неверный взгляд. Одно неловкое слово. Один подозрительный жест — и твоя жизнь оборвется".

traits.locale_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. Even if the Rogue Trader had stood up for you. One wrong glance, One awkward word. One suspicions gesture — and your life is over."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. Even if the Rogue Trader had stood up for you. One wrong glance, One awkward word. One suspicions gesture — and your life is over."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “你最好学会谨慎一点，异形。或许行商浪人帮得了你这一次，但下一次……一个错误的眼神，一个鲁莽的口误，或是一个可疑的手势——我就会要了你的命。”
languages.original_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: “你最好学会谨慎一点，异形。或许行商浪人帮得了你这一次，但下一次……一个错误的眼神，一个鲁莽的口误，或是一个可疑的手势——我就会要了你的命。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «La humildad no es una de tus virtudes, xenos. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha dado la cara por ti, pero... una mirada torcida, una palabra fuera de tono, un gesto sospechoso... y tu vida habrá terminado».
languages.original_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: «La humildad no es una de tus virtudes, xenos. {mf|El|La} Comerciante Independiente ha dado la cara por ti, pero... una mirada torcida, una palabra fuera de tono, un gesto sospechoso... y tu vida habrá terminado».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « L'humilité ne fait pas partie de vos qualités, xénos. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a peut-être pris votre défense, mais il suffira d'un regard déplacé, d'un mot de trop, d'un geste inopportun... pour que je m'occupe personnellement de vous. »
languages.original_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: « L'humilité ne fait pas partie de vos qualités, xénos. {mf|Le libre-marchand|La libre-marchande} a peut-être pris votre défense, mais il suffira d'un regard déplacé, d'un mot de trop, d'un geste inopportun... pour que je m'occupe personnellement de vous. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Demut gehört nicht zu Euren Tugenden, Xenos. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} mag für Euch eingetreten sein, aber ... ein falscher Blick, ein falsches Wort, eine verdächtige Geste – und Euer Leben ist vorbei."
languages.original_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: "Demut gehört nicht zu Euren Tugenden, Xenos. {mf|Der Freihändler|Die Freihändlerin} mag für Euch eingetreten sein, aber ... ein falscher Blick, ein falsches Wort, eine verdächtige Geste – und Euer Leben ist vorbei."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「謙虚さはお前の美徳などではない、異種族よ。自由開拓者はお前のために立ち上がったが…一瞥を誤り、口を滑らせ、不審な仕草をすれば…お前の命はそこで潰えるだろう」
languages.original_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: 「謙虚さはお前の美徳などではない、異種族よ。自由開拓者はお前のために立ち上がったが…一瞥を誤り、口を滑らせ、不審な仕草をすれば…お前の命はそこで潰えるだろう」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Tevazu erdemine sahip değilsin zeno. Hür Tacir seni savunmuş olabilir ama... Tek bir ters bakışında, tek bir yanlış sözünde, tek bir şüpheli hareketinde işin biter."
languages.original_text: "Humility is not one of your virtues, xenos. The Rogue Trader may have stood up for you, but... one wrong glance, one slip of the tongue, one suspicious gesture — and your life is over."

traits.locale_text: "Tevazu erdemine sahip değilsin zeno. Hür Tacir seni savunmuş olabilir ama... Tek bir ters bakışında, tek bir yanlış sözünde, tek bir şüpheli hareketinde işin biter."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
